import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import ChatInputAvoca from"./ChatInputavoca";import ChataMessage from"./ChataMessage";import ChatSuggestions from"./ChatSuggestions";import"./ChatbotAvoca.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatbotAvoca=()=>{const[messages,setMessages]=useState([{text:"Welcome!",sender:"bot"},{text:"How may I assist you today?",sender:"bot"}]);const handleSendMessage=async message=>{setMessages(prevMessages=>[...prevMessages,{text:message,sender:"user"}]);try{const response=await axios.post("http://localhost:8080/api/chat/chat",{message});setMessages(prevMessages=>[...prevMessages,{text:response.data.reply,sender:"bot"}]);}catch(error){console.error("Error sending message to backend:",error);// Optionally, handle the error by updating the state or showing a message to the user
}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chatbotavoca",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"messages",children:messages.map((msg,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChataMessage,{message:msg},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChatSuggestions,{onSuggestionClick:handleSendMessage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChatInputAvoca,{onSendMessage:handleSendMessage})]})});};export default ChatbotAvoca;// Default export
